scripts.dev: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run dev -ws --if-present
scripts.export: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run export -ws --if-present
scripts.local:serve: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run local:serve -ws --if-present
